name: mikroe.click.hbridge14
short_description: H-Bridge 14 Click is a compact add-on board with an H-Bridge gate driver, also known as a full-bridge pre-driver. This board features the DRV8873, an automotive H-Bridge motor driver from Texas Instruments. The DRV8873 is an N-channel H-Bridge motor driver that can drive one bidirectional brushed DC motor, two unidirectional brushed DC motors, solenoids, or other resistive inductive loads.
